description: This Spiced Apple Kombucha recipe is the perfect fall cocktail! It's made with apple cider, kombucha, and&nbsp;spiced rum. It's a refreshing and slightly tart drink that is perfect for sipping on a cool autumn evening.
keywords: How To Spiced Apple Kombucha Cocktail
name: Spiced Apple Kombucha Cocktail

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker over ice, combine ½ cup apple cider, ½ cup spiced rum, and 2 teaspoons lemon juice. Shake for about 30 seconds until chilled.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker over ice, combine ½ cup apple cider, ½ cup spiced rum, and 2 teaspoons lemon juice. Shake for about 30 seconds until chilled.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the mixture into two rocks glasses with large ice cubes. Repeat with the rest of the apple cider, rum, and lemon juice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mixture into two rocks glasses with large ice cubes. Repeat with the rest of the apple cider, rum, and lemon juice.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ¼ cup of apple kombucha to each glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish each glass with 1 cinnamon stick and an apple slice.
